replies.bodyText: They are actually used.. I did not originally copy them from the kie-wb-common-dmn-kogito-webapp-common modules' pom.xml and encountered a lot of compilation errors generating the GWTTestCase.. I slowly added them back one by one to end until all the compilation errors (relating to missing sources).
replies.author: manstis

replies.bodyText: I'll look at the enforcer issue now....
